thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com
thread.title: Scott Keaton

author: Scott Keaton
title: Scott Keaton
text: I am not a normal caller to Help Desks for software, so I didn't know where I would be routed or who would be assisting me, but Alice exceeded my expectations and left me with a very favorable view of how ZipRecruiter, as an organization, trains and motivates its employees. If everything goes this well with ZR, I expect we will get good results. Thanks Again. Scott
